title: Cannot play the game. Is it always this horrid?
body: Just started this account and yet every match is wretched and full of the most horrid "people". They are all bitter angry and put more time and effort into fighting each other than the other team. Does it get better, or the community in this game always this wretched?

replies.body:
Sadly it's kind of a thing that happens with MOBAs- people don't really learn sportsmanship.

 LoL is a little better these days because if you are level 30 you do find some games where everyone is chill or the game is really hilarious and friendly or most people are just quiet and ping. If you just started it's even worse because a lot of people are immature and migrating from other MOBAs where they don't get punished for being awful and start to salt and rage on their teammates, and they haven't gotten banned and punished in LoL for being toxic yet.  (There *is* punishment for toxicity going up.  I started a smurf to play with my friend who just started together, went one game in it and was shocked at how awful people were behaving comparatively to my usual account).    I would suggest as the others said, muting all and enjoying the game.  So it *does* get better when you've leveled up till there is ranked and most of them have started to be punished for toxicity and learned to not rage and so on.    It's a little easier in the ARAM and featured game modes, where everyone is playing casually, so there is less of the toxicity, and normal games when there is ranked for people playing seriously.    You can communicate objectives even if you mute all and also use pings for objectives- most games use pings for objectives anywho.   

From what I recall (though it was a long time ago) of my experience smurfing (versus my experience now, where I usually don't mute all unless i need to coz people are quiet and amiable in norms but you can get a jerk  1/5 games or 1/2 games or something), I would recommend muting all and enjoying the game.  or muting your teammates :3.

most games are like that, unless its 1v1. (mostly)

/mute all, do that a ton, then you wont care. majority of people are not worth the time reading what they say or ping, so i mute everyhting possilbe

I would say the whole community is toxic or as minimum useless.
So if you came here for community-- leave.

I'd say the toxicity shifts.
Low elo = trolls and flamers
Middle elo = "Know it alls"
High elo = Depending on who is in your game. Streamers can be crazy toxic ( for views ), but mostly is pretty good.

And between elos its like a combo of each.

Since I started playing on another account, I can tell you it gets somewhat better. You get more competitive people, but if you don't want to get into people fighting in chat then make a group of friends and play pres.

Low levels are full of people who placed in Iron V, are sure they dont deserve this, and made a new account to try again. And people so dysfunctional they will ragequit, smash their monitor and remove themselves from the playerbase before lv30. Or get banned before lv30.
